title: @Riot, feel free to post in this thread
body:
If you're by chance browsing GD and notice this but typically you avoid GD for fear of being attacked, post here and find out otherwise. You'll have casual trolls who goof around and maybe an idiot or two or goes on a rampage, but you'll find most of us are pretty chill and like to kick it. 

Post here and tell me about yourselves, don't worry I'm already older than you so age isn't an issue (and even if I'm not trust me I feel older!). So post away red friends, we don't bite, I promise. Well, ok How Do You Meta bites for a certain price but that's it, I swear.
